feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(linear): slightly better logging of signature checks by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.16...v0.15.17

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(salesforce): reinit pubsub client on all errors, sleep + cosmetic tweaks by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1240

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.17...v0.15.18

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(misc): db and manifest fixes by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1243
  • fix(github): negate conditional that results in false negative during GitHub PAT auth by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1246
  • feat: allow to start a session in another project by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1215
  • feat: experimental autkitteh mcp, allows ai to play with kittens by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1242
  • fix(build): only build directories with python by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1238
  • chore(salesforce): add log to prevent silent failure during subscription by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1247
  • refactor: replace kittehs.FirstNonZero with cmp.Or by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1249
  • feat(python): Allow user to mark function as no activities by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1227
  • fix(pythonrt): reduce prints drain time to 10ms by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1250
  • bug(python): Error when there's a directory by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1254
  • feat(GitHub): support GHES in private OAuth by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1253
  • chore(python): Seesion test for a Python directory by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1255
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1258
  • bug(python): Cleaner test exit and restore print by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1252
  • bug(python): Show pickle help error message by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1251
  • feat(build): add metadata to build; show resources at dashboard project view by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1248
  • feat: add tracing, refactor telemetry by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1244

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.18...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.16.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: do not build every file for python, simplify build logic by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1259
  • fix: error handling by @KILLY000 in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1260
  • feat: add app name field for GitHub custom OAuth by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1261
  • chore(python): Reduce server start time by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1264
  • docs: update readme by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1267
  • fix: unwrap dicts with struct keys by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1268
  • feat(python): Support async handlers by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1256
  • fix(python): Append site-packages to sys.path by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1269
  • fix: limit max wait for initial health check on dial runner + show user container start error by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1270
  • feat(salesforce): add support for replay_id by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1241
  • add more versions to published images by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1278

New Contributors

  • @KILLY000 made their first contribution in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1260

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add missing v prefix to images by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1280
  • Update README.md by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1274
  • chore(go): Bump to 1.24.2 and use the new tool directive by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1271
  • bug(python): Global print hangs by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1277
  • python: when runner takes a while to start, print a message by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1282
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 from 4.0.1 to 4.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1284
  • fix: separate temporal dev server download and start by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1273
  • fix(python): Handle non-pickleable return values by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1279
  • disable arm64 build for now by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1287
  • feat: make usage reporter report by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1272

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.16.1...v0.17.0
